title: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Pale Blue Striations, early 20th century
title_raw: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Pale Blue Striations
medium: brush and pale blue watercolor on cream wove coated paper
markings: On verso, at lower right (above inscription): partly visible Wiener Werkstatte stamp in purple ink.  [See notes]
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, lower right: M1.50 / KW 1169; lower right: 1116 [above] 1633(3)[with horizontal line between them]
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: loose and pale, watery blue striations/ faint grid.  Paper looks "combed" or like finger-painted design.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Pale Blue Striations, early 20th century. brush and pale blue watercolor on cream wove coated paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-8.
